title: Novel Humanizes The 'Hyena Of The Gestapo'
teaser: Lovers at the Chameleon Club, Paris 1932 is the latest novel by author Francine Prose. NPR's Lynn Neary speaks with Prose about her novel, set in Paris from the 1920s to the end of World War II.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
